analyzed: bdag nyid gzhan du bsgyur ba med pa ste /

analyzed: skyes bus nye bar btags pa'i 'brel pa can du 'gyur na yang de tsam gyis snga ma'i gnas skabs 'brel pa med pa can gyi rang bzhin las 'jig pa'i chos can ma yin no //

analyzed: de nyid brten par bya bar rigs kyi don dam par ni ma yin no zhes zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, it is reasonable to rely on that, but not ultimately.

original: rten zhig pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi bsam pa la dogs par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: rten zhig pas zhes bya ba la sogs pa gzhan gyi bsam pa la dogs par byed pa yin te /
translated: The other party’s doubt is expressed in the line “If the basis is destroyed . . .”

original: gang du rten nyams pa'i rgyus brten pa 'jig pa'i phyir 'brel pa mi rtag pa yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la ste /
analyzed: gang du rten nyams pa'i rgyus brten pa 'jig pa'i phyir 'brel pa mi rtag pa yin no zhes bshad pa gang yin pa de la ste /
translated: This is because the basis is destroyed due to the cause of the destruction of the basis, and therefore the relationship is impermanent.

analyzed: sun 'byin pa 'di la gal te rten ni 'jig na yang 'brel pa ni 'jig min rtag phyir rigs dang 'dra zhes bya ba brjod de /
translated: In response to this critique, it is said, “If the basis is destroyed, the relationship is not destroyed, because it is permanent, like the class.”

original: 'di ltar 'brel pa ni rigs rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'brel pa ni rigs rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Thus, because the relationship is permanent, like the class.

original: rten zhig na yang mi 'jig pa de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni len yin no //
analyzed: rten zhig na yang mi 'jig pa de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni len yin no //
translated: If the basis is destroyed, it is not destroyed. This is the response.

original: de la yang sun 'byin pa smos te /
analyzed: de la yang sun 'byin pa smos te /
translated: Here, the refutation is stated:

original: rtag rnams te /🔽rigs la sogs pa 'gyur ba med par mngon par 'dod pa rnams la rten gyi nus pa gang /
analyzed: rtag rnams te / rigs la sogs pa 'gyur ba med par mngon par 'dod pa rnams la rten gyi nus pa gang /
translated: If the permanent🔽If the permanent is asserted to be unchanging, such as the class, then what is the capacity of the support?

original: cung zhig kyang byed pa med pa gang gis rten @264b de 'dod pa yin /
analyzed: cung zhig kyang byed pa med pa gang gis rten @264b de 'dod pa yin /
translated: What is the support that is asserted to be the support?

original: 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshig le'ur byas pa'i don 'chad par byed pa la /
analyzed: 'di skad du zhes bya ba la sogs pas tshig le'ur byas pa'i don 'chad par byed pa la /
translated: In the statement “This is heard,” and so on, the meaning of the verses is explained.

original: thos mod kyi zhes bya ba 'di ni rab tu grags pa tsam de ni dngos po med pa can yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: thos mod kyi zhes bya ba 'di ni rab tu grags pa tsam de ni dngos po med pa can yin no zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: This is merely well known, but it is taught that it is not a real thing.

original: rigs rtag pa de yang gsal ba rnams la brten pa yin na yang /
analyzed: rigs rtag pa de yang gsal ba rnams la brten pa yin na yang /
translated: If that permanent class is also the support of the manifestations,

original: rten dang lhan cig 'jig pa yin no zhes thos mod kyi /
analyzed: rten dang lhan cig 'jig pa yin no zhes thos mod kyi /
translated: it is destroyed together with the support.

original: 'on kyang rigs la sogs pa rtag pa rnams la rten gyis byas pa'i phan 'dogs pa'i rten gyi nus pa ma mthong na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rigs la sogs pa rtag pa rnams la rten gyis byas pa'i phan 'dogs pa'i rten gyi nus pa ma mthong na /
translated: However, if the permanent class and so on are not seen to be supported by the capacity of the support,

original: gang gis na 'di rten mngon par 'dod pa'i rten yin /
analyzed: gang gis na 'di rten mngon par 'dod pa'i rten yin /
translated: then what is the support that is asserted to be the support?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: byas pa ste sgrub pa'i rang bzhin la byed pa med pa'i phyir dang / rten byed pa po ma yin pa yang mi ltos pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because the nature of that which is produced or established is devoid of activity, and because that which is not a supporting basis is not dependent.

original: gal te rigs dang 'brel pa ni rten las gsal ba ste /
analyzed: gal te rigs dang 'brel pa ni rten las gsal ba ste /
translated: If you say that the connection with a type is the manifestation of the object due to the supporting basis,

original: mngon par gsal ba dmigs su rung ba nyid du 'gyur ba de nyid rten gyis byas pa'i phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu yin pa de bas na dngos po la rten zhes bya'o zhe na /

translated: because the manifestation is suitable to be observed, and that is the cause of benefit that is done by the supporting basis, therefore the object is called a “supporting basis.”

original: lan du shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: lan du shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: In response, the root text states, “consciousness,” and so on.

original: shes pa skyed byed lhan cig byed /
analyzed: shes pa skyed byed lhan cig byed /
translated: The simultaneous cause of the arising of consciousness

original: sgron ma la sogs pa la rgyu rnams tshogs par 'gyur ba las te /
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pa la rgyu rnams tshogs par 'gyur ba las te /
translated: is the collection of causes, such as the lamp, and so on.

original: yul rung ba'i gnas skabs las so //
analyzed: yul rung ba'i gnas skabs las so //
translated: It is from the condition of the object being suitable.

original: de skyed par ni rung nyid phyir te /
analyzed: de skyed par ni rung nyid phyir te /
translated: It is suitable to produce that,

original: rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro ;
analyzed: rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i rnam par shes pa skyed pa'i nus pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro ;

analyzed: rigs la sogs pa gsal bya dag rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro // rigs la sogs pa de rnams kyi gsal byed rang gi don ci byas te phan gdags pa cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: 18. The production of the manifest is not different from the production of the manifest pot, etc.🔽19. The production of the manifest is not different from the production of the manifest pot, etc.

analyzed: gang gi phyir rigs la sogs pa de dag gsal byed des gsal ba ste mngon par gsal bar 'dod / lhan cig byed pa ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: 20. The production of the manifest is not different from the production of the manifest pot, etc.

original: lhan cig byed pa snang ba ste /
analyzed: lhan cig byed pa snang ba ste /
translated: 21. The production of the manifest is not different from the production of the manifest pot, etc.

original: sgron ma la sogs pa las so //🔽ci lta bur gyur pa zhe na /
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pa las so // ci lta bur gyur pa zhe na /
translated: 22. The production of the manifest is not different from the production of the manifest pot, etc.

original: nye bar len pa la ltos pa las te /
analyzed: nye bar len pa la ltos pa las te /
translated: 23. The production of the manifest is not different from the production of the manifest pot, etc.🔽2

original: bum pa la sogs skad cig ma sa ma ni shes pa bskyed pa'i nus med pa yin la /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs skad cig ma sa ma ni shes pa bskyed pa'i nus med pa yin la /
translated: A pot, etc., is not a moment that is not able to generate consciousness.

original: bum pa la sogs pa'i skad cig ma'i nus pa ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin te /🔽de la @265a * //
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa'i skad cig ma'i nus pa ni nye bar len pa'i rgyu yin te / de la @265a * //
translated: The moment of a pot, etc., is the substantial cause of the generation of consciousness.

original: ltos pa las rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par rung ba'i skad cig ma gzhan skye ba kho na bum pa la sogs pa mngon par gsal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa las rang gi yul la shes pa skyed par rung ba'i skad cig ma gzhan skye ba kho na bum pa la sogs pa mngon par gsal ba ma yin no //
translated: In dependence on that, another moment of consciousness is generated that is suitable to generate consciousness of its object.

original: de lta ma yin na gal te sgron me la sogs pa las shes bskyed par rung ba nyid bum pa la sogs pa thob par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe de la phan 'dogs pa ste /
analyzed: de lta ma yin na gal te sgron me la sogs pa las shes bskyed par rung ba nyid bum pa la sogs pa thob par mi 'gyur ba de'i tshe de la phan 'dogs pa ste /
translated: That is the manifestation of a pot, etc. Otherwise, if the suitability to generate consciousness from a lamp, etc., were not obtained by a pot, etc., then it would follow that the benefit of that,

original: sgron ma la phan 'dogs pa dag shes pa bskyed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgron ma la phan 'dogs pa dag shes pa bskyed par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: the benefit of the lamp, would generate consciousness.

original: ci ste sgron ma la sogs pas sngar gsal ba nus pa med pa ni nus pa byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: ci ste sgron ma la sogs pas sngar gsal ba nus pa med pa ni nus pa byed par 'dod pa de'i tshe /
translated: But if it is asserted that the previous non-moment that is not able to generate consciousness is made able to generate consciousness by a lamp, etc.,🔽then it follows that the lamp, etc., would generate consciousness.

original: nus pa byed pa sgron ma la sogs pa ni bum pa la sogs pa la shes pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa byed pa sgron ma la sogs pa ni bum pa la sogs pa la shes pa skyed par byed pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The lamp and so on, which are the causes of the effect, are the producers of the consciousness of the pot and so on.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: nus pa de ni de'i bdag nyid can nyid de /
analyzed: nus pa de ni de'i bdag nyid can nyid de /
translated: Because that potency is of the nature of the manifest,

original: gsal ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gsal ba'i bdag nyid can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is of the nature of the manifest.

original: de skyes pas bum pa la sogs pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de skyes pas bum pa la sogs pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ro //
translated: When it is produced, the pot and so on are produced.

original: ci ste nyes pa der ma gyur cig snyam pas /
analyzed: ci ste nyes pa der ma gyur cig snyam pas /
translated: But if you think, “Let us not commit that error,”

original: sgron ma la sogs pas byas pa'i nus pa ni gsal bya las don gzhan nyid du 'dod pa de'i ste /
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pas byas pa'i nus pa ni gsal bya las don gzhan nyid du 'dod pa de'i ste /
translated: then the potency produced by the lamp and so on is asserted to be a different object from the manifest.

original: nus pa'i don gzhan du khas len na ni bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la sgron ma la sogs pa phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: nus pa'i don gzhan du khas len na ni bum pa la sogs pa'i dngos po la sgron ma la sogs pa phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: If you accept that the potency is a different object, it follows that the lamp and so on do not benefit the thing, the pot and so on.

original: gzhan la byas pa ni gzhan la phan btags par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan la byas pa ni gzhan la phan btags par 'gyur ba ma yin te /
translated: What is done for one thing is not done for another,

original: shin tu thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: shin tu thal ches pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is too much.

original: gang yang sgron ma la sogs pa'i nus pa don gzhan yin pa des kyang bum pa la sogs pa zhes bya bskyed pa'i phyir dus thams cad du nus pa kho na gzung bar bya ba yin pas /
analyzed: gang yang sgron ma la sogs pa'i nus pa don gzhan yin pa des kyang bum pa la sogs pa zhes bya bskyed pa'i phyir dus thams cad du nus pa kho na gzung bar bya ba yin pas /
translated: Also, the other object, the potential of the lamp, and so on, is apprehended at all times because it generates such things as the pot.

original: rang gi yul la shes pa bskyed pa ma yin pa bum pa la sogs pa dag ni mi 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rang gi yul la shes pa bskyed pa ma yin pa bum pa la sogs pa dag ni mi 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, since the potential alone is apprehended, such things as the pot, which do not generate consciousness of their object, are not apprehended.

original: bum pa la sogs pa 'dzin par 'dod pa de'i tshe /🔽yang snang ba la ltos pa med pa can 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa 'dzin par 'dod pa de'i tshe / yang snang ba la ltos pa med pa can 'dzin par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
translated: When one wishes to apprehend such things as the pot,🔽then it follows that one would apprehend that which does not rely on appearance,

original: snang ba la ltos pa med pa'i bum pa la sogs pa 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: snang ba la ltos pa med pa'i bum pa la sogs pa 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: because one would obtain the apprehension of such things as the pot that do not rely on appearance.

original: gal te ji ltar na snang ba la ltos pa med pa yin zhe na /
analyzed: gal te ji ltar na snang ba la ltos pa med pa yin zhe na /
translated: If one asks, how is it that they do not rely on appearance?

original: ltos pa med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: ltos pa med pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The response is “that which does not rely on appearance,” and so on.

original: bum pa la sogs pa snang ba la ltos pa med pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bdag nyid la phan 'dogs pa med pa ste /
analyzed: bum pa la sogs pa snang ba la ltos pa med pa thob pa gang yin pa de ni bdag nyid la phan 'dogs pa med pa ste /
translated: That which obtains such things as the pot that do not rely on appearance does not benefit itself.

original: sgron ma la sogs pas bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid la phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgron ma la sogs pas bum pa la sogs pa'i bdag nyid la phan 'dogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the lamp, etc. do not benefit the nature of the pot, etc.

original: nus pa @265b tha dad pa yin na bum pa la sogs pa dag cung zad kyang phan 'dogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: nus pa @265b tha dad pa yin na bum pa la sogs pa dag cung zad kyang phan 'dogs pa ma yin no //
translated: If there is a difference in potentiality, the pot, etc. do not benefit at all.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir ro //
translated: Therefore means for that reason.

original: gsal bya 'di dag ni rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: gsal bya 'di dag ni rang gi yul la rnam par shes pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: These manifestations are the causes of consciousness in regard to their own objects,

original: de'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: de'i rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning of which is the reason for that.

original: gzhan bum pa la sogs pa yang ltos par gyur pa na ;
analyzed: gzhan bum pa la sogs pa yang ltos par gyur pa na ;
translated: The other, the pot, etc. are dependent.

original: de las zhes bya ba gzhan las rang gi ngo bo phul du byung ba ste /
analyzed: de las zhes bya ba gzhan las rang gi ngo bo phul du byung ba ste /
translated: From that means from the other, the excellence of its own nature.

original: shes pa skyed par rung ba'i rang gi ngo bo bdag gir byed do //
analyzed: shes pa skyed par rung ba'i rang gi ngo bo bdag gir byed do //
translated: It appropriates the nature of its own suitability for the production of consciousness.

original: rgyu des na sgron ma la sogs pa 'di'i gsal byar mngon par 'dod pa de dag bskyed par bya ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: rgyu des na sgron ma la sogs pa 'di'i gsal byar mngon par 'dod pa de dag bskyed par bya ba kho na yin no //
translated: For that reason, those manifestations of this lamp, etc. are only to be produced, which are desired to be manifested.

original: gal te bskyed par bya ba la ci'i phyir gsal bya zhes de ltar ston par byed ce na /
analyzed: gal te bskyed par bya ba la ci'i phyir gsal bya zhes de ltar ston par byed ce na /
translated: If one asks why the object to be produced is called the manifest,

original: shes bya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: shes bya'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “The object of consciousness,” etc.🔽The nature of consciousness is the manifest, etc.

original: gsal byed sgron ma la sogs pa las shes pa'i ngo bo ste /🔽gzung ba'i ngo bo thob pa ste /
analyzed: gsal byed sgron ma la sogs pa las shes pa'i ngo bo ste / gzung ba'i ngo bo thob pa ste /
translated: The nature of the object apprehended is the manifest, etc.🔽because it is the cause of attainment.

original: rnyed pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnyed pa'i rgyu'i phyir ro //
translated: Since it is the object of consciousness, it is the manifest, etc.

original: gdon mi za bar de'i yul can gyi shes par 'gyur ba de bas na /
analyzed: gdon mi za bar de'i yul can gyi shes par 'gyur ba de bas na /
translated: Therefore, the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,

analyzed: shes pa'i dbang gis te 'bras bu'i khyad par du brjod pa kun nas 'dzin pa'i shes pa ni /
translated: is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,🔽is the consciousness that is the result of the power of the manifest, etc.,

original: 'bras bu'i khyad par du brjod pa gsal bya la sogs pa'i sgras kun nas ma bzung ba'i shes pa can gyi 'bras bu rnams las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir /🔽gdon mi za ba zhes pas gzung bar bya ba gnag yin pa de bskyed par bya ba yin du zin kyang gsal bya zhes brjod do //
analyzed: 'bras bu'i khyad par du brjod pa gsal bya la sogs pa'i sgras kun nas ma bzung ba'i shes pa can gyi 'bras bu rnams las khyad par du bya ba'i phyir /🔽gdon mi za ba zhes pas gzung bar bya ba gnag yin pa de bskyed par bya ba yin du zin kyang gsal bya zhes brjod do //
translated: because it is the cause of the attainment of the manifest, etc.🔽The consciousness

original: de ltar gyur pa yin pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu nyid ces brjod de /
analyzed: de ltar gyur pa yin pa gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu nyid ces brjod de /
translated: That which is so is called the effect.

original: de ltar rab tu grub pa'i don du gsal bya brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de ltar rab tu grub pa'i don du gsal bya brjod pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that it is stated in order to clarify the meaning that is well established.🔽Those that are related to the species, etc.,

original: de ltar rigs dang 'brel pa la sogs pa dag ni zhes bya ba ni rigs dang 'brel pa dang / de dag dang por byas pa gang la yod pa de dag ni rigs dang 'brel pa la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: de ltar rigs dang 'brel pa la sogs pa dag ni zhes bya ba ni rigs dang 'brel pa dang / de dag dang por byas pa gang la yod pa de dag ni rigs dang 'brel pa la sogs pa dag go //
translated: Those that are related to the species, etc., are those that have those as their first cause.

original: sogs pa'i sgras ni gzhan rag pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i rten yang yongs su gzung ngo //
analyzed: sogs pa'i sgras ni gzhan rag pa la mngon par 'dod pa'i rten yang yongs su gzung ngo //
translated: The word “etc.” includes the basis that is desired by others.

original: rten du 'dod pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //🔽phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa des de ltar /
analyzed: rten du 'dod pa rnam pa 'ga' zhig gis phan gdags par bya ba ma yin pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro // phan 'dogs par byed pa ma yin pa des de ltar /
translated: Because it is not something that should be benefited by any kind of basis that is desired.

original: gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
analyzed: gsal bar rigs pa ma yin no zhes bya bar sbyar ro //
translated: It is not reasonable for that which does not benefit to be clarified in that way.

original: gal te yang sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa dngos po nyid yin par 'gyur ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te yang sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa dngos po nyid yin par 'gyur ba nyid yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If the relationship between words and meanings were a real thing,

original: 'brel pa dang dngos po nyid yin na yang 'brel pa can dag las 'brel pa ni tha dad phyir te /
analyzed: 'brel pa dang dngos po nyid yin na yang 'brel pa can dag las 'brel pa ni tha dad phyir te /
translated: then even if it were a real thing, the relationship would be different from the related things, because

original: 'brel pa zhe @266a * //
analyzed: 'brel pa zhe @266a * //
translated: the relationship is different.

original: bya ba dngos po gsum skye bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: bya ba dngos po gsum skye bar 'gyur la /
translated: If the relationship were a real thing, then three things would arise:🔽the relationship, the word, and the meaning.

original: de yang gal te dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de yang gal te dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyir gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: Moreover, if the relationship were characterized by observation,

original: tha dad phyir blo sna tshogs 'gyur pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad phyir blo sna tshogs 'gyur pa ste /
translated: then the mind would be various, because

original: don gsum dmigs pa nyid kyis so //
analyzed: don gsum dmigs pa nyid kyis so //
translated: the three things would be observed.

original: 'brel pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: 'brel pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with “The relationship, etc.”

original: sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa de yang dngos por 'gyur na /
analyzed: sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa de yang dngos por 'gyur na /
translated: If the relationship between words and meanings were a real thing,

original: des par sgra dang don dag las tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa las 'das pa ste brgal ba ma yin no //
analyzed: des par sgra dang don dag las tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa las 'das pa ste brgal ba ma yin no //
translated: then it would definitely not transcend being either different from the word and meaning or not different from them.

original: de nyid dang gzhan nyid las dngos po rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan nyid las dngos po rnam pa gzhan mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because it is impossible for a thing to be different from itself or not different from itself.

original: de bas na gal te 'brel pa can dag las de tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de bas na gal te 'brel pa can dag las de tha dad pa yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, if it is different from the relata,

original: de las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: de las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: then it is not different from them.

original: gang gi phyir ngo bo ste rang bzhin dngos po yin na rang bzhin de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa nyid de /
analyzed: gang gi phyir ngo bo ste rang bzhin dngos po yin na rang bzhin de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin pa nyid de /
translated: Because if the nature or essence of a thing is not that very nature,

original: de nyid ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid yin no zhes ngo bo der gyur pa ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i skabs su bshad zin to //
analyzed: de nyid ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid yin no zhes ngo bo der gyur pa ma yin pa ni gzhan nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i skabs su bshad zin to //
translated: it is not that very thing, but rather it is different. This is because it is not beyond being different from that very nature. This has already been explained in the section on the relation.

original: 'brel pa de yang mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin na /
analyzed: 'brel pa de yang mig gis gzung bar bya ba yin na /
translated: If the relation is apprehended by the eye,

original: rang gi blo ste 'brel pa la dmigs pa can gyi blo las de las gzhan pa dag las ngo bo tha dad pa can zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa gzhan pa de las ngo bo tha dad pa can de nyid 'brel pa'i bdag nyid can yin te /
analyzed: rang gi blo ste 'brel pa la dmigs pa can gyi blo las de las gzhan pa dag las ngo bo tha dad pa can zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa gzhan pa de las ngo bo tha dad pa can de nyid 'brel pa'i bdag nyid can yin te /
translated: then the relation is different from the relata, because it is the object of a different cognition, that is, a cognition that observes the relation.

original: 'brel pa can gyi ngo bor snang ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi ngo bor snang ba med pa zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning of “it does not appear as the nature of the relata” is that it is not the same as the relata.

original: ji ltar na de ltar 'gyur ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar na de ltar 'gyur ba ste /
translated: How is that so?

original: de las gzhan pa dag las ngo bo tha dad pa can du ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: de las gzhan pa dag las ngo bo tha dad pa can du ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could it be different from the others?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: gnas skabs kyi don la snang ba tha dad pa med pa ste bye brag med cing khyad par med pa dang / ma mthong ba gang yin pa de dag ni snang ba tha dad pa med pa dang / ma mthong ba dag ste go rims bzhin du tha dad pa dang yod pa nyid bzlog pa dag gi brten pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gnas skabs kyi don la snang ba tha dad pa med pa ste bye brag med cing khyad par med pa dang / ma mthong ba gang yin pa de dag ni snang ba tha dad pa med pa dang / ma mthong ba dag ste go rims bzhin du tha dad pa dang yod pa nyid bzlog pa dag gi brten pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the non-difference of appearance and the non-perception of difference are, respectively, the basis of the negation of difference and existence.

original: tha dad pa bzlog pa ni tha dad pa med pa ste /
analyzed: tha dad pa bzlog pa ni tha dad pa med pa ste /
translated: The negation of difference is non-difference.

original: de mthong ba dang tha dad pa med pa rten yin zhing /

original: de lta ma yin pa gang zhig gang las don gzhan yin no zhes khas len pa dang / snang ba de las tha dad pa med pa dang / ma mthong ba yod pa ma yin pa la /
analyzed: de lta ma yin pa gang zhig gang las don gzhan yin no zhes khas len pa dang / snang ba de las tha dad pa med pa dang / ma mthong ba yod pa ma yin pa la /
translated: If it were not so, then whatever is different from something else would be accepted as being different from it, and it would not be different from that appearance, and it would not be non-seen.

original: gal te tha dad pa dang yod pa nyid du brtags pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te tha dad pa dang yod pa nyid du brtags pa de'i tshe /
translated: If it is imagined that it is different and existent,

original: de dag gis @266b gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de dag gis @266b gnas pa ste /
translated: then it would be established by those.

original: tha dad pa med pa dang ngo bo med pa dag gi gnas skabs ni med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa dang ngo bo med pa dag gi gnas skabs ni med par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: The state of non-difference and non-entity would be non-existent.

original: 'di ltar gal te snang ba tha dad pa med pa dang ma mthong ba de dag ni gnas 'di'i rgyu mtshan yin na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te snang ba tha dad pa med pa dang ma mthong ba de dag ni gnas 'di'i rgyu mtshan yin na /
translated: Thus, if the non-difference of the appearance and the non-seeing are the reason for this state,

original: tha dad pa med pa dang ngo bo med pa dag ni sgrub par byed par 'dod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: tha dad pa med pa dang ngo bo med pa dag ni sgrub par byed par 'dod pa ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: then non-difference and non-entity would not be accepted as the proof,

original: de'i gnas skabs rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i gnas skabs rgyun chad par 'gyur ro //
translated: and then its state would be interrupted.

original: gal te 'brel pa ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa blo la mi snang du zin kyang dbang po la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon yod pa ma yin te ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i dbang po
analyzed: gal te 'brel pa ni dbang po las 'das pa nyid yin pa'i phyir tha dad pa blo la mi snang du zin kyang dbang po la sogs pa dang 'dra bar ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon yod pa ma yin te ji ltar mig la sogs pa'i dbang po
translated: If you say that the relation is beyond the senses, and therefore, even though the difference does not appear to the mind, there is no fault as explained above, like the senses, etc.,

original: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa blo la snang ba med pa de lta na yang ;
analyzed: gzugs la sogs pa las tha dad pa blo la snang ba med pa de lta na yang ;
translated: then, just as the difference of the eye, etc., from form, etc., does not appear to the mind,

original: tha dad pa yod pa de dang 'dra bar 'brel ba yang 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: tha dad pa yod pa de dang 'dra bar 'brel ba yang 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: in the same way, the relation would be like the difference, which exists.

original: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gog par byed de /
analyzed: ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'gog par byed de /
translated: To refute this, he says, “No, etc.”

original: 'brel pa dbang po las 'das pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa dbang po las 'das pa ma yin no //
translated: The relation is not beyond the senses.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: dbang po las 'das pa'i 'brel pa de las don mi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa'i 'brel pa de las don mi rtogs par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro//
translated: Because it follows that the object is not cognized from that relation beyond the senses.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: rab tu ma grub pa ste rang gi ngo bor ma nges pa ni shes par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rab tu ma grub pa ste rang gi ngo bor ma nges pa ni shes par byed pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
translated: Because that which is not well established, not ascertained as its own nature, is not itself a revealer.

original: gang zhig gang na lhan cig 'brel pa ma bzung ba de'i sgo nas de rtogs par rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig gang na lhan cig 'brel pa ma bzung ba de'i sgo nas de rtogs par rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable to cognize something by means of something else that is not simultaneously apprehended.

original: de ltar ni 'gyur na gsal bar byed pa thams cad ni rang gi bdag nyid kyi shes pa la ltos nas /
analyzed: de ltar ni 'gyur na gsal bar byed pa thams cad ni rang gi bdag nyid kyi shes pa la ltos nas /
translated: If that were so, then all illuminating would be dependent on the cognition of one’s own self.

original: gsal ba'i don gsal bar byas pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: gsal ba'i don gsal bar byas pa ma yin gyi /
translated: The meaning of the object would not be illuminated by the illumination of the object.

original: 'on kyang dbang po dang 'dra ba thag nye ba tsam gyis yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang dbang po dang 'dra ba thag nye ba tsam gyis yin no zhe na /
translated: However, it is merely the proximity of the sense faculty that is like the sense faculty.

original: thag nye ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: thag nye ba tsam gyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: “ Merely proximity” is stated.

original: yod pa tsam gyis don shes par bya ba nyid yin par khas len na ni sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa la blo ma byang ba rnams kyis kyang don 'di rjod par byed pa don 'di'i yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yod pa tsam gyis don shes par bya ba nyid yin par khas len na ni sgra dang don gyi 'brel pa la blo ma byang ba rnams kyis kyang don 'di rjod par byed pa don 'di'i yin no zhes rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it is accepted that the mere existence of the object is to be cognized, then even those who are not skilled in the relation between words and meanings would understand that this meaning is expressed by this word.

original: 'dod par ni 'gyur na 'brel pa tha dad par dmigs pa nyid ni yod pa de yang mngon sum las 'das pa ma yin gyi /
analyzed: 'dod par ni 'gyur na 'brel pa tha dad par dmigs pa nyid ni yod pa de yang mngon sum las 'das pa ma yin gyi /
translated: If that were accepted, then the relation would be perceived as distinct. That existence is not beyond direct perception.

original: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pa las yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on kyang rjes su dpag pa las yin no zhe na /
translated: However, it is by inference.

original: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rjes su dpag pa las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: Therefore, it is said, “Inference is not established from a relationship.”

original: 'brel pa rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa ma yin no ;
analyzed: 'brel pa rjes su dpag pa las rtogs pa ma yin no ;
translated: A relationship is not understood from inference.

original: ; ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ; ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: rtags med pa'i phyir te 'brel pa sgrub par byed pa'i rtags ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rtags med pa'i phyir te 'brel pa sgrub par byed pa'i rtags ni cung zad kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because there is no reason. There is not the slightest reason that would establish a relationship.

original: 'bras bur gyur pa'i don khong du chud par brtags pa yin par brjod na /
analyzed: 'bras bur gyur pa'i don khong du chud par brtags pa yin par brjod na /
translated: If it is said that the meaning that is the effect is understood by implication,

original: de yang 'brel pa grub pa sngon du song ba can yin na de grub pa med par yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtags ma yin @267a * //
analyzed: de yang 'brel pa grub pa sngon du song ba can yin na de grub pa med par yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir rtags ma yin @267a * //
translated: that is also not a reason, because if it is preceded by the establishment of a relationship, that is not possible without the establishment of that.

original: no ; / dpe ma grub pa'i phyir yang rjes su dpag pa las rjes su grub pa ma yin no //
analyzed: no ; / dpe ma grub pa'i phyir yang rjes su dpag pa las rjes su grub pa ma yin no //
translated: Inference is not established from inference because the example is not established.

original: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa log par rtogs pa de lta bur gyur pa'i 'brel pa 'ga' zhig kyang grub pa med na gang zhig dper 'gyur /
analyzed: brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa log par rtogs pa de lta bur gyur pa'i 'brel pa 'ga' zhig kyang grub pa med na gang zhig dper 'gyur /
translated: If that relationship that is understood to be mistaken, which has the characteristic of the expressed and the expresser, does not exist in any way, what would be the example?

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dpe nyid du bstan par 'gyur ba de yang dbang po las 'das pa'i rgyu nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpe nyid du bstan par 'gyur ba de yang dbang po las 'das pa'i rgyu nyid kyis sgrub par byed pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That example itself is also dependent on a proof, because it is beyond the senses.

original: sgrub par byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: sgrub par byed pa yang yod pa ma yin te /
translated: And there is no proof,

original: de yang dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro //🔽gal te dbang po la sogs pa dag la yang ste /
analyzed: de yang dpe ma grub pa'i phyir ro // gal te dbang po la sogs pa dag la yang ste /
translated: because that example is not established.🔽If you infer the existence of something beyond the senses,

original: dbang po las 'das pa nyid du yod pa dag la /🔽sgrub par byed pa rjes su dpag par byed na /
analyzed: dbang po las 'das pa nyid du yod pa dag la / sgrub par byed pa rjes su dpag par byed na /
translated: such as the sense faculties,

original: dpe dang bral ba de dang de la mtshungs pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: dpe dang bral ba de dang de la mtshungs pa yin no zhe na /
translated: then that proof is similar to the case at hand, which lacks an example.

original: mtshungs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: mtshungs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not similar.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: dbang po la sogs pa de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyi rjes su dpag pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: dbang po la sogs pa de dag ni rnam pa gzhan gyi rjes su dpag pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because those sense faculties and so on are inferred to be of another type.

original: dbang po mngon sum ma yin pa rnams kyi ngo bo 'ga' zhig 'dis sgrub par mi byed na gang gis skyon mtshungs par 'gyur /
analyzed: dbang po mngon sum ma yin pa rnams kyi ngo bo 'ga' zhig 'dis sgrub par mi byed na gang gis skyon mtshungs par 'gyur /
translated: If this does not establish the nature of those that are not directly perceived by the sense faculties, then what is the fault of similarity?

original: 'on kyang snang ba la sogs pa 'ga' zhig yod pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang snang ba la sogs pa 'ga' zhig yod pa na rjes su 'gro ba dang / ldog pa dang ldan pa ste /
translated: But when some things such as light are present, there is the possession of the presence of the effect, the possession of the absence of the effect, and the possession of the presence and absence of the effect.

original: yod pa dang med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
analyzed: yod pa dang med pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i don te /
translated: The meaning of the words is: the possession of presence, the possession of absence, and the possession of the presence and absence of the effect.

original: mig 'dzums pa la sogs pa'i gnas ni ldog pa dang ldan pa yin la /
analyzed: mig 'dzums pa la sogs pa'i gnas ni ldog pa dang ldan pa yin la /
translated: The state of the closing of the eyes, etc. is the possession of the absence of the effect.

original: bzlog pa'i gnas skabs ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: bzlog pa'i gnas skabs ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldan pa'o //
translated: The state of the reversal of that is the possession of the presence of the effect.

original: shes pa ni mngon sum 'bras bur gyur pa'o //
analyzed: shes pa ni mngon sum 'bras bur gyur pa'o //
translated: The cognition is the effect of perception.

original: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa des de tsam la mi 'byung ba can te /
analyzed: de lta bur gyur pa'i 'bras bu'i shes pa des de tsam la mi 'byung ba can te /
translated: The cognition of the effect is like that. It does not occur without the presence of that.

original: gang yod pa dag la yang med par ma mthong ba de tsam las mi 'byung ba can te /
analyzed: gang yod pa dag la yang med par ma mthong ba de tsam las mi 'byung ba can te /
translated: When it is present, it is not seen to be absent. It does not occur without that.

original: mi skye ba'i bdag nyid sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: mi skye ba'i bdag nyid sgrub par byed do //
translated: It establishes the nature of non-arising.

original: de las ldog pa la ltos pa ste /
analyzed: de las ldog pa la ltos pa ste /
translated: It depends on the reversal of that.

original: ji ltar rgyu thag nye par gyur pa las ldog pa'i rgyu la ltos pa sgrub par byed do //
analyzed: ji ltar rgyu thag nye par gyur pa las ldog pa'i rgyu la ltos pa sgrub par byed do //
translated: Just as the establishment of the dependence on the reversal of the cause is when the cause is near.

original: rgyu gzhan 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: rgyu gzhan 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin pa de bas na /
translated: Since there is no other cause at all,

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbang po grub pa yin no //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas 'bras bu'i sgo nas dbang po grub pa yin no //
translated: The sense faculties are established by way of their effects, as explained by the reasoning.

original: 'dir dpe yang myu gu la sogs pa rgyu ma tshang ba'i mi 'byung ba can dag yin no //
analyzed: 'dir dpe yang myu gu la sogs pa rgyu ma tshang ba'i mi 'byung ba can dag yin no //
translated: Here, the examples are such things as sprouts, which do not occur when their causes are incomplete.

original: 'di ltar 'brel pa ni mig la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'bras bu ldog pa'i sgo nas rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'brel pa ni mig la sogs pa dang 'dra bar 'bras bu ldog pa'i sgo nas rjes su dpag pa ma yin te /
translated: Thus, the relation is not inferred by way of the cessation of the effect, as is the case with the eye faculty, etc.

original: 'brel pa de ma grub na 'brel pa'i 'bras bu shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa de ma grub na 'brel pa'i 'bras bu shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because if that relation is not established, the effect of the relation, the cognition, does not exist.

original: gal te sgra dang don nyid 'brel pa rjes su dpog pa'i rtags pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra dang don nyid 'brel pa rjes su dpog pa'i rtags pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If it is argued that the relation between the word and the meaning itself is the reason for the inference,

original: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: he says, “In that case, etc.”

original: @267b 'brel pa de la ni sgra dang don gyi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: @267b 'brel pa de la ni sgra dang don gyi ngo bo ste /
translated: In that relation, the nature of the word and the meaning

original: rang bzhin rtags ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin rtags ma yin no //
translated: is not the reason.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sgra dang don dag ni thams cad rung ba nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: sgra dang don dag ni thams cad rung ba nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: Because the word and the meaning are possible in all cases.

original: sgra thams cad ni don thams cad kyi brjod par rung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / don thams cad ni sgra thams cad kyi brjod par bya ba nyid du rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sgra thams cad ni don thams cad kyi brjod par rung ba nyid kyi phyir dang / don thams cad ni sgra thams cad kyi brjod par bya ba nyid du rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because all words are suitable to express all meanings, and all meanings are suitable to be expressed by all words.

original: don gyi khyad par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'brel pa yin la /
analyzed: don gyi khyad par rtogs pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'brel pa yin la /
translated: The reason for understanding a specific meaning is a relation.

original: don gyi khyad par rtogs pa la brten pa'i 'brel pa ni sgra dang don ma nges pa dag las rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: don gyi khyad par rtogs pa la brten pa'i 'brel pa ni sgra dang don ma nges pa dag las rtogs pa med pa'i phyir ram /
translated: If the relation were based on the understanding of a specific meaning, then there would be no understanding from words and meanings that are not related,

original: rtogs na khyad par med par 'brel pa med pa thams cad rtogs pa la 'gyur ba'i phyir don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rtogs na khyad par med par 'brel pa med pa thams cad rtogs pa la 'gyur ba'i phyir don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: or if there were understanding, then there would be understanding of all things that are not related, because there would be no distinction.

original: de ltar yang ma yin par de bas na sgra dang don dag las 'di rtogs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de ltar yang ma yin par de bas na sgra dang don dag las 'di rtogs pa ma yin no //
translated: But that is not the case, therefore, there is no understanding from words and meanings.

original: gal te sgra dang don dag las 'brel pa'i khyad par dang lhan cig 'ga' zhig tu 'brel pa grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te sgra dang don dag las 'brel pa'i khyad par dang lhan cig 'ga' zhig tu 'brel pa grub par 'gyur ba de'i tshe /
translated: If a relation were established in some way together with a specific relation from words and meanings,

original: 'brel pa'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur na /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i khyad par rtogs par 'gyur na /
translated: then a specific relation would be understood.

original: 'brel pa'i khyad par gyi sgra dang don la rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid la 'brel pa'i khyad par rtogs par 'dod na /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i khyad par gyi sgra dang don la rgyu mtshan med pa can nyid la 'brel pa'i khyad par rtogs par 'dod na /
translated: If you maintain that the special relation is understood without a reason,

original: 'brel pa rtogs pa de rgyu mtshan med pa can yin pa 'dod na de'i khyad par rtogs pa nges pa dang 'dra ba ste /
analyzed: 'brel pa rtogs pa de rgyu mtshan med pa can yin pa 'dod na de'i khyad par rtogs pa nges pa dang 'dra ba ste /
translated: then the understanding of that special relation is like the certainty of understanding.

original: 'brel pa'i khyad par rtogs pa'i nges pa dang 'dra bar sgra rnams kyis don bstan pa na yang rgyu mtshan med pa can du ci'i phyir mi 'dod //
analyzed: 'brel pa'i khyad par rtogs pa'i nges pa dang 'dra bar sgra rnams kyis don bstan pa na yang rgyu mtshan med pa can du ci'i phyir mi 'dod //
translated: Just as there is certainty in understanding the special relation, why do you not maintain that the meaning is taught by words without a reason?

original: sgra dang don gyi rang bzhin can gyi brtags de ni 'brel pa thams cad go bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sgra dang don gyi rang bzhin can gyi brtags de ni 'brel pa thams cad go bar 'gyur ro //
translated: That designation which has the nature of the word and the meaning understands all relations.

original: de nyid kyi phyir khyad par med pa nyid du don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir khyad par med pa nyid du don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: For that very reason, all meanings are understood without distinction.

original: thams cad kyis te skyes bus bzung ba'i brda dang ma bzung ba'i brdas don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thams cad kyis te skyes bus bzung ba'i brda dang ma bzung ba'i brdas don thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro //
translated: All understand, that is, all people, whether they have grasped the convention or not, understand all meanings.

original: de bas na ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas 'brel pa grub pas don rtogs pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na ji skad du bshad pa'i rigs pas 'brel pa grub pas don rtogs pa'i rgyu'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, because the relationship is established by the reasoning explained above, the sound of a word is the cause of understanding the meaning.

original: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis don rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i man ngag ste /
analyzed: skyes bu 'ga' zhig gis don rtogs pa'i phyir yang dag pa'i man ngag ste /
translated: Because a person understands the meaning, it is a correct instruction.

original: gzhan gyi man ngag la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi man ngag la ltos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It does not depend on another’s instruction.

original: gal te sgra yang gar ba ni 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid ma yin gyi 'on kyang man ngag dang bcas pa'i sgra ni rtag pa nyid yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te sgra yang gar ba ni 'brel pa bstan pa'i phyir rtag pa nyid ma yin gyi 'on kyang man ngag dang bcas pa'i sgra ni rtag pa nyid yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the sound of a word is not permanent because it teaches the relationship, but the sound of a word together with the instruction is permanent,

original: de bas na da ni brgyud pa 'dis ci zhig bya ste /🔽yang dag pa'i man ngag dang de las sgra rtags nyid dang de las don rtogs pa zhes bya ba brgyud pa'i 'dis ci zhig bya /🔽yang dag pa'i man ngag la ltos par sgra yan gar ba don dam pa'i 'brel pas stong pa de nyid don shes @268a * //
analyzed: de bas na da ni brgyud pa 'dis ci zhig bya ste / yang dag pa'i man ngag dang de las sgra rtags nyid dang de las don rtogs pa zhes bya ba brgyud pa'i 'dis ci zhig bya / yang dag pa'i man ngag la ltos par sgra yan gar ba don dam pa'i 'brel pas stong pa de nyid don shes @268a * //
translated: then what is the use of this process?🔽What is the use of this process, which is called “the correct instruction,” “the sound of a word from that,” and “the understanding of the meaning from that”?

original: par byed par ci'i phyir mi byed de /
analyzed: par byed par ci'i phyir mi byed de /
translated: Why does the sound of a word alone, which is empty of ultimate relationship, not cause the understanding of the meaning, depending on the correct instruction?

original: gang gi 'brel pas gzhan rnam par rtog par byed /
analyzed: gang gi 'brel pas gzhan rnam par rtog par byed /
translated: What is the connection by which one conceives of another?

original: sgra de yang gang la bsam pa can gyis te /
analyzed: sgra de yang gang la bsam pa can gyis te /
translated: And that sound is seen by one who has the intention,

original: don gang zhig brjod pa'i bsam pa can gyi skyes bus rab tu sbyor bar byed pa brda'i dus su mthong gi gzhan du mi mthong ste zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod ba'i don las ldog par sbyor ba ni mi mthong ngo //
analyzed: don gang zhig brjod pa'i bsam pa can gyi skyes bus rab tu sbyor bar byed pa brda'i dus su mthong gi gzhan du mi mthong ste zhes bya ba ni brjod par 'dod ba'i don las ldog par sbyor ba ni mi mthong ngo //
translated: by a person who is engaged in the intention to express a certain meaning, at the time of the convention, but not otherwise. This means that one does not see the application of the opposite of the intended meaning.

original: 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bshad pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'dis ni rjes su 'gro ba dang ldog pa bshad pa de ltar na /
translated: By this, the pervasion and the counter-pervasion are explained.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag las du ba la sogs pa dang 'dra ba don de rtogs pa skyed par byed do //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag las du ba la sogs pa dang 'dra ba don de rtogs pa skyed par byed do //
translated: Thus, from the seen and the unseen as explained, like smoke and so on, it produces the understanding of that meaning.

original: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis bstan pa sgra dang don dag gi med na mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba de nyid 'brel pa yin no //
analyzed: mthong ba dang ma mthong ba dag gis bstan pa sgra dang don dag gi med na mi 'byung ba zhes bya ba de nyid 'brel pa yin no //
translated: The non-apprehension of the taught sound and meaning is called the invariable relation, and that itself is the connection.

original: don rtogs pa bskyed pa 'di la yang ji skad du bshad pa'i med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ma rtogs par /
analyzed: don rtogs pa bskyed pa 'di la yang ji skad du bshad pa'i med na mi 'byung ba'i 'brel pa ma rtogs par /
translated: In order to generate understanding of the meaning, one must understand the relation of invariable concomitance as explained above.

original: gzhan don dam pa'i 'brel pa'i nus pa ma mthong zhing /
analyzed: gzhan don dam pa'i 'brel pa'i nus pa ma mthong zhing /
translated: In this context, the production of the understanding of the meaning is not seen to have the power of a real relation, without understanding the relation of invariable concomitance as it has been explained.

original: 'brel pa'i don gzhan de bsgrub pa'i thabs te /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i don gzhan de bsgrub pa'i thabs te /
translated: And the meaning of the relation is not seen to be the means of establishing the other,

original: bsgrub pa'i rtags kyang cung zad tsam yang ma mthong ngo //
analyzed: bsgrub pa'i rtags kyang cung zad tsam yang ma mthong ngo //
translated: nor is the sign of the establishment of the other seen in the slightest.

original: de ltar re zhig 'brel pa tha dad pa'i skyon dag bshad nas /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig 'brel pa tha dad pa'i skyon dag bshad nas /
translated: Thus, having explained the errors of a relation that is different,

original: tha mi dad par khas len pa'i skyon ni ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: tha mi dad par khas len pa'i skyon ni ci ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: the error of accepting that it is not different is stated in “If the relation of word and meaning is not different, . . .”

original: gal te sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa gzhan nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te sgra dang don dag gi 'brel pa gzhan nyid ma yin pa de'i tshe /
translated: If the relation of word and meaning is not different,

original: 'brel pa can de dag las 'brel pa tha dad min na /
analyzed: 'brel pa can de dag las 'brel pa tha dad min na /
translated: then the relation is not different from the relata.

original: 'brel pa can sgra dang don 'ba' zhig de nyid yin pa de ltar na /
analyzed: 'brel pa can sgra dang don 'ba' zhig de nyid yin pa de ltar na /
translated: If the relation is just the word and meaning, the relata,

original: 'brel pa zhes bya ba gang yang med do //
analyzed: 'brel pa zhes bya ba gang yang med do //
translated: then there is no such thing as a relation.

original: gal te 'o na de nyid gang gzhan nyid dang bral ba'i 'brel pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: gal te 'o na de nyid gang gzhan nyid dang bral ba'i 'brel pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the relation is just that, which is free from difference,

original: 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: 'di las zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: “From this” and so on.

original: de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di las /
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan nyid kyi rnam par rtog pa 'di las /
translated: From the conceptualization of sameness and difference,

original: dngos po gzhan yod pa ma yin te dngos po yang ngo bo med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan yod pa ma yin te dngos po yang ngo bo med pa'i phyir /
translated: a different entity does not exist, because an entity is essenceless.

original: de nyid dang gzhan nyid las 'das pa yin no //
analyzed: de nyid dang gzhan nyid las 'das pa yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is beyond sameness and difference.

original: gnas skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: gnas skabs zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with “The different states” and so on.

original: gnas skabs gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gzhan gyi gnas skabs na'o //
analyzed: gnas skabs gzhan ni zhes bya ba ni rang bzhin gzhan gyi gnas skabs na'o //
translated: “The different states” refers to the different natures.

original: ngo bo tha dad pa'i rgyu can nyid yin pa de ni rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ngo bo tha dad pa'i rgyu can nyid yin pa de ni rang bzhin sna tshogs pa'i rgyu can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it has a different nature, it has a variety of causes.

original: gang yang tha dad pa'i ngo bo can ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i ngo bo nyid can te /
analyzed: gang yang tha dad pa'i ngo bo can ni ma yin gyi 'on kyang de'i ngo bo nyid can te /
translated: “But it is not that it has a different nature, but rather it has that nature.

original: 'brel pa'i ngo bo kho nar 'dod pa 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de nyid yin par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: 'brel pa'i ngo bo kho nar 'dod pa 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i dngos po de nyid yin par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: The very thing that is called ‘relation’ is asserted to be the nature of the relation.”

original: 'brel pa can gyi rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa can gyi rang bzhin kho nar 'gyur gyi gzhan ni ma yin no //
translated: It would be the nature of the relata, but it would not be different from them.

original: sna tshogs pa nyid @268b ma yin du zin kyang khyod kyis byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid tha dad par gzhag par byas pa yang ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: sna tshogs pa nyid @268b ma yin du zin kyang khyod kyis byas pa dang mi rtag pa nyid tha dad par gzhag par byas pa yang ma yin zhe na /
translated: Even if it were not a diversity, you have not established difference between what is produced and impermanence.

original: sngar bshad pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: He says, “by the previously explained reasoning,” etc.

original: chos tha dad pa kun du brtags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos tha dad pa kun du brtags pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the difference of phenomena is imagined.

original: sngar bshad pa'i rims pas zhes bya ba ni gzhan sel bar byas pa'i log pas byas pa'i tha dad pa'i rten can gyis so //
analyzed: sngar bshad pa'i rims pas zhes bya ba ni gzhan sel bar byas pa'i log pas byas pa'i tha dad pa'i rten can gyis so //
translated: “By the previously explained reasoning” means by the difference that is the basis of the negation that is the exclusion of other.

original: ldog par byas pa'i tha dad pa rtogs pas byas pa de yang gcig la 'gal ba med pa yin gyi /
analyzed: ldog par byas pa'i tha dad pa rtogs pas byas pa de yang gcig la 'gal ba med pa yin gyi /
translated: That difference, which is produced by the understanding of the negation that is the exclusion of other, is not contradictory in one thing.

original: dngos po tha dad pa ni gcig la 'gal ba med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: dngos po tha dad pa ni gcig la 'gal ba med pa ma yin te /
translated: But difference of thing is contradictory in one thing.

original: 'on kyang 'gal ba kho na yin no //
analyzed: 'on kyang 'gal ba kho na yin no //
translated: But it is just contradictory.

original: gcig la don dam par sna tshogs pa nyid mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig la don dam par sna tshogs pa nyid mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because a diversity ultimately is not possible in one thing.

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa ma gtogs pa /
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa ma gtogs pa /
translated: Apart from difference and non-difference,

original: dngos po rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
analyzed: dngos po rnam pa gzhan ni med do //
translated: there is no other kind of thing.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: dngos po de ni ngo bo ste rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dngos po de ni ngo bo ste rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because that entity has the characteristic of an essence, that is, a nature.

original: ngo bo yang rnam par rtog pa de las ma 'das pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: ngo bo yang rnam par rtog pa de las ma 'das pa'i phyir te /
translated: And an essence is not beyond that conceptualization,

original: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha dad pa dang tha dad pa med pa'i rnam par rtog pa las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not beyond the conceptualization of difference and non-difference.

original: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid kyi dngos po'i ngo bo tha dad phyir /
analyzed: gzhan yang ngo bo nyid kyi dngos po'i ngo bo tha dad phyir /
translated: Moreover, because the essence of an entity is different,

original: ngo bo 'dres pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid kyi brel pa med kyi /
analyzed: ngo bo 'dres pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi de kho na nyid kyi brel pa med kyi /
translated: there is no connection to reality, which has the characteristic of a mixed essence, and so on.

original: 'on kyang 'brel pa rtogs pas byas pa yin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'on kyang 'brel pa rtogs pas byas pa yin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: However, it is said that the connection is made by the understanding.

original: sngar yod pa dang med pa de dag la brten nas ma 'dres su zin kyang /
analyzed: sngar yod pa dang med pa de dag la brten nas ma 'dres su zin kyang /
translated: Even though those previously existent and non-existent things are not mixed,

original: tha snyad la goms pa'i skyes bu la 'dres par snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad zin to //
analyzed: tha snyad la goms pa'i skyes bu la 'dres par snang ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad zin to //
translated: it is explained by such statements as “because they appear mixed to a person accustomed to conventionalities.”

original: gang gi phyir 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa ni dngos po ma 'dres pa ste mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dres pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa ni dngos po ma 'dres pa ste mtshan nyid tha dad pa rnams la yod pa ma yin no //
translated: Because a relationship that has the characteristic of a mixture does not exist for things that are not mixed, that is, for those that have different characteristics.

original: sgra'am don rnams kyi ngo bo 'dres pa las don gzhan nyi ni 'brel pa'i dngos po gsum pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: sgra'am don rnams kyi ngo bo 'dres pa las don gzhan nyi ni 'brel pa'i dngos po gsum pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you think that a third thing, a relationship, is a different object from the nature of the word or the object,

original: de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: de dag gi zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: he says, “Their nature,” and so on.

original: dngos po yod par gyur pa don gzhan la rag lus pa ste /
analyzed: dngos po yod par gyur pa don gzhan la rag lus pa ste /
translated: An existent thing is dependent on a different object.

original: 'brel pa can la rag lus pa dngos po gzhan gyi 'brel par ji ltar 'gyur /
analyzed: 'brel pa can la rag lus pa dngos po gzhan gyi 'brel par ji ltar 'gyur /
translated: How could a different thing that is dependent on a related thing be a relationship?

original: ci ste yang 'gyur na ngo bo yang 'dres pa kho na 'brel pa yin na /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'gyur na ngo bo yang 'dres pa kho na 'brel pa yin na /
translated: But if it were, then the nature of a mixture would be the relationship.

original: de yang 'brel pa'i rgyu rdzas gzhan gsum pa yod na 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: de yang 'brel pa'i rgyu rdzas gzhan gsum pa yod na 'gyur ro zhes bstan par bya ba de'i phyir /
translated: And that would be the case if there were a third substance that is the cause of the relationship.

original: rdzas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rdzas ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: To demonstrate this, he says, “Substance,” and so on.

original: rdzas zhes bya ba don gzhan dngos po gsum pa ji ltar na gzhan gyi 'brel pa yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste /🔽'brel pa'i rgyu'i 'brel pa'i ngo bor 'dres pa'i rgyur ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i @269a * //
analyzed: rdzas zhes bya ba don gzhan dngos po gsum pa ji ltar na gzhan gyi 'brel pa yin zhes sbyar bar bya ste / 'brel pa'i rgyu'i 'brel pa'i ngo bor 'dres pa'i rgyur ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i @269a * //
translated: How could a substance be a different, third thing that is related to another?🔽The meaning of this is: how could a substance be the cause of the relation that is the nature of the mixing of two things?

original: don to // dngos po yod pa gzhan la rag lus pa'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni /🔽dngos po gsum pa kho na 'brel pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
analyzed: don to // dngos po yod pa gzhan la rag lus pa'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ni / dngos po gsum pa kho na 'brel pa yin no zhes bshad zin to //
translated: A relation that is the dependence of an existent thing on another is a third thing.🔽This has already been explained.

original: rdzas 'brel par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dis ni dngos po gsum pa ni ngo bo 'dres pa'i rgyu nyid du bshad de /
analyzed: rdzas 'brel par 'gyur zhes bya ba 'dis ni dngos po gsum pa ni ngo bo 'dres pa'i rgyu nyid du bshad de /
translated: The phrase “a substance would be related” explains that a third thing is the cause of the mixing of natures.

original: 'brel pa ni ngo bo 'dres pa'i rgyu yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa ni ngo bo 'dres pa'i rgyu yin no //
translated: A relation is the cause of the mixing of natures.

original: 'di gnyi ga yang mi rigs so //
analyzed: 'di gnyi ga yang mi rigs so //
translated: Both of these are illogical.

original: de la dang por rung ba ston te /
analyzed: de la dang por rung ba ston te /
translated: First, the opponent’s position is presented.

original: yod pa grub pa gzhan la ltos par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba grub pa la thams cad du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: yod pa grub pa gzhan la ltos par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ba grub pa la thams cad du 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: The phrase “an existent thing that is established would not depend on another” means that it is accepted that an established thing does not depend on another.

original: ltos pa med par rang brgyud pa de lta bur pa de ni gzhan gyi 'bral pa ma yin no //
analyzed: ltos pa med par rang brgyud pa de lta bur pa de ni gzhan gyi 'bral pa ma yin no //
translated: That which is self-sufficient without dependence is not mixed with another.

original: rung ba yin pa gnyis pa ni rdzas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: rung ba yin pa gnyis pa ni rdzas zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: The second, “compatibility,” is stated by “substance,” etc.

original: rdzas zhes bya ba rang bzhin brjod pa ste /
analyzed: rdzas zhes bya ba rang bzhin brjod pa ste /
translated: “Substance” is a term for nature.

original: dngos po gzhan kho na brjod pa yin na /
analyzed: dngos po gzhan kho na brjod pa yin na /
translated: If it is a different thing,

original: de ji ltar 'brel pa can gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos po gzhan la 'dres par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de ji ltar 'brel pa can gyi rang bzhin gyi dngos po gzhan la 'dres par 'gyur te /
translated: how can it be mixed with another thing that is related to it?

original: 'dres pa'i rgyur ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'dres pa'i rgyur ji ltar 'gyur zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: What is the cause of mixing?

original: rang bzhin gzhan yod pa nyid kyis gzhan 'brel pa can gyi rang bzhin 'dres pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rang bzhin gzhan yod pa nyid kyis gzhan 'brel pa can gyi rang bzhin 'dres pa ma yin no //
translated: The existence of another nature is not mixed with another related nature.

original: gal te 'dres pa can te 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa med pa dang 'dres par 'gyur mod kyi 'dres pa can te 'brel pa dang 'dres par 'gyur ro zhe na de ltar ma yin no //
analyzed: gal te 'dres pa can te 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i 'brel pa med pa dang 'dres par 'gyur mod kyi 'dres pa can te 'brel pa dang 'dres par 'gyur ro zhe na de ltar ma yin no //
translated: If it is mixed with a related thing, even though the relation called “mixing” does not exist, mixing occurs. But that is not so.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'brel pa 'dres par 'gyur ba gang gis 'brel pa can de dag la 'dres par 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba de nyid 'brel pa can de dag dang 'dres par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa 'dres par 'gyur ba gang gis 'brel pa can de dag la 'dres par 'gyur ba'i 'brel pa zhes bya ba de nyid 'brel pa can de dag dang 'dres par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The relation that is mixed with the relata is not established as mixed with those relata, because of the statement, “The relation that is mixed with those relata is called the relation that is mixed with them.”

original: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba la sogs pa la /
translated: Therefore, etc.

original: gal te don 'brel pa can gzhan dag don gzhan gsum pa dang 'dres par gyur pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: gal te don 'brel pa can gzhan dag don gzhan gsum pa dang 'dres par gyur pa de'i tshe /
translated: If the other relata are mixed with a third object, then

original: thams cad gsum pa 'ga' zhig dang 'dres par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: thams cad gsum pa 'ga' zhig dang 'dres par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: it follows that everything is mixed with some third object,

original: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because there is no difference.

original: 'brel pa mngon par 'dod pa dang / gzhan ni dngos po gzhan dang 'brel pa can nyid du khyad par cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'brel pa mngon par 'dod pa dang / gzhan ni dngos po gzhan dang 'brel pa can nyid du khyad par cung zhig kyang yod pa ma yin no //
translated: There is not the slightest difference between the relation that is asserted and the other that is related to another thing.

original: gzhan yang re zhig dpyod pa la yi ge ste /
analyzed: gzhan yang re zhig dpyod pa la yi ge ste /
translated: Moreover, first, the letters are analyzed.

original: dngos po yod pa gang yin pa de dag don med pa can yin no //
analyzed: dngos po yod pa gang yin pa de dag don med pa can yin no //
translated: Those that exist as things are meaningless.

original: de bas na de dag rjod par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
analyzed: de bas na de dag rjod par byed pa ma yin pa de'i phyir /
translated: Therefore, they are not expressers. For that reason,

original: de la brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i 'brel pa gnas pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de la brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i 'brel pa gnas pa ma yin no //
translated: The relation of the expressed and the expresser does not exist.

original: 'o na tshig la sogs pa don dang bcas pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir de la 'brel pa gnas par 'gyur ro zhe na /🔽tshig sogs kun brtags zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: 'o na tshig la sogs pa don dang bcas pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir de la 'brel pa gnas par 'gyur ro zhe na / tshig sogs kun brtags zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Well, since words, etc. are meaningful, the relation of those will exist.🔽He says, “All words, etc. are imagined.”

original: sogs pa'i @269b sgras ni ngag kun du brtags pa yin te /
analyzed: sogs pa'i @269b sgras ni ngag kun du brtags pa yin te /
translated: The word “etc.” includes speech.

original: yi ge bkod pa kho na tshig dang ngag kun du brtags pa de ni rjod par byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge bkod pa kho na tshig dang ngag kun du brtags pa de ni rjod par byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: That imagined word and speech are just the arrangement of letters. They are the expresser.

original: blos kun nas brtags pa'i tshig dang ngag de yang /
analyzed: blos kun nas brtags pa'i tshig dang ngag de yang /
translated: And that word and speech imagined by the intellect

original: dngos med la ste dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin la ji ltar don dam par te /
analyzed: dngos med la ste dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin la ji ltar don dam par te /
translated: in regard to non-entity, i.e., the nature of non-entity,

original: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa 'di ni gnas par gyur pa yin te ma yin no //
analyzed: dngos po'i rang bzhin gyis brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i mtshan nyid can gyi 'brel pa 'di ni gnas par gyur pa yin te ma yin no //
translated: how can this relation, which has the character of the expressed and the expresser by way of the nature of entity, ultimately exist? It cannot!

original: rjod par byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas 'chad par byed de /
translated: He explains this with “The expresser, etc.”

original: rjod par byed pa ni tshig gi yan lag ste /
analyzed: rjod par byed pa ni tshig gi yan lag ste /
translated: The expression is the part of speech.

original: 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i rgyus de dang ldan te /
analyzed: 'brel pa zhes bya ba'i rgyus de dang ldan te /
translated: It is related by the cause called “relation.”

original: 'brel pa dang ldan par 'gyur na'o //
analyzed: 'brel pa dang ldan par 'gyur na'o //
translated: It is related when it is related.

original: yi ge yod de snang du zin kyang rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge yod de snang du zin kyang rjod par byed pa ma yin te /
translated: Even if the letters do exist and are perceived, they are not the expression,

original: don med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don med pa can nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because they are meaningless.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni de'i phyir te /
translated: Therefore means for that reason.

original: yi ge de dag la brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: yi ge de dag la brjod par bya ba dang rjod par byed pa'i 'brel pa yod pa ma yin te /
translated: The letters do not have the relation of expressed and expresser,

original: de dag la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: de dag la gnas pa ste /
translated: because they are not the basis.

original: rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i yi ge de dag 'brel pa gnas pa yod na ;
analyzed: rjod par byed pa ma yin pa'i yi ge de dag 'brel pa gnas pa yod na ;
translated: If the letters that are not the expression have the relation of basis,

original: 'brel pa rjod par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyams par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'brel pa rjod par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo gang yin pa de nyams par thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: then the nature of the expresser would be impaired.

original: rjod par byed pa ma yin pa dag la gnas pa ni rje khol gyi 'brel pa dang 'dra bar rjod par byed par 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: rjod par byed pa ma yin pa dag la gnas pa ni rje khol gyi 'brel pa dang 'dra bar rjod par byed par 'gyur bar rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not reasonable that the letters that are not the expression would become the expresser, like the relation of master and slave.

original: gal te bkod pa'i khyad par te mthar gyis pa'i khyad par gyis yi ge nyid rjod par byed pa yin pa de bas na /
analyzed: gal te bkod pa'i khyad par te mthar gyis pa'i khyad par gyis yi ge nyid rjod par byed pa yin pa de bas na /
translated: If the difference in arrangement is the difference in the order of the letters, then the letters themselves are what is expressed.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon 'di yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i skyon 'di yod pa ma yin no zhe na /
translated: Therefore, the previously mentioned error does not exist.

original: de nyid ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de nyid ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: 'di ltar yi ge rnams las bkod pa don gzhan nyid ma yin pa'am /
analyzed: 'di ltar yi ge rnams las bkod pa don gzhan nyid ma yin pa'am /
translated: In that case, is the arrangement different from the letters or not?

original: don gzhan nyid du 'gyur grang na /
analyzed: don gzhan nyid du 'gyur grang na /
translated: If the arrangement is different from the letters,

original: de la phyogs dang po ni yi ge rnams las bkod pa ni don gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi rgyus tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir te /
analyzed: de la phyogs dang po ni yi ge rnams las bkod pa ni don gzhan ma yin pa nyid kyi rgyus tha dad pa med pa nyid kyi phyir te /
translated: then the first possibility is that the arrangement is not different from the letters because it is not different from them.

original: bye brag med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
analyzed: bye brag med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
translated: Because it is not different from them.

original: gang zhig gang las don tha dad pa med pa de ni /
analyzed: gang zhig gang las don tha dad pa med pa de ni /
translated: That which is not different from something

original: de las rang bzhin tha dad pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de las rang bzhin tha dad pa can du mi 'gyur ro //
translated: is not different from it in nature.

original: de bas na yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi bkod pa de'i ngo bo can no zhes bya ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de las bkod pa gzhan 'tsho zhes bya ba de yang /
analyzed: de bas na yi ge'i bdag nyid can gyi bkod pa de'i ngo bo can no zhes bya ba'i ngo bo gang yin pa de las bkod pa gzhan 'tsho zhes bya ba de yang /
translated: Therefore, the arrangement that has the nature of the letters is not different from the letters.

original: yi ge rnams las khyad par med pa'i phyir don rtogs pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: yi ge rnams las khyad par med pa'i phyir don rtogs pa mtshungs par 'gyur ro //
translated: because there is no difference between the letters.

original: 'on te yi ge rnams las bkod pa tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: 'on te yi ge rnams las bkod pa tha dad pa yin no zhe na /
translated: But if the arrangement is different from the letters,

original: de'i phyir don gzhan nyid yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /🔽yi ge rnams la bkod pa don gzhan nyid yin na yang 'og nas @270a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir don gzhan nyid yin na zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te / yi ge rnams la bkod pa don gzhan nyid yin na yang 'og nas @270a * //
translated: then the author states, “If the meaning is different, etc.”🔽If the arrangement is different from the letters,

original: 'gag par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'gag par 'gyur ro //
translated: then the meaning will be different from the letters.

original: de bas na zhes bya ba ni ngag nye bar dgod pa'am de'i phyir gyi don te /
analyzed: de bas na zhes bya ba ni ngag nye bar dgod pa'am de'i phyir gyi don te /
translated: Therefore, the author says, “Therefore, etc.”
